entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle, also known as Lord Voldemort, was a person who showed contempt for being ordinary and wanted to be different.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle was the first name of the person who later became Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The adult version of Tom Riddle, who had created a mask to hide his identity.

relationships.description: Tom Riddle and Lord Voldemort are the same person, with Tom Riddle being the first name and Lord Voldemort being the later created mask.
